mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRESCH_SCHEDULE WHERE SCH_CD = #{schCd} ORDER BY CREATED_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRESCH_SCHEDULE (SCH_CD, SCHEDULE_TYPE, SCHEDULE_DATE, SCHEDULE_CONTENT, CREATED_DT, CREATED_BY) VALUES (#{schCd}, #{scheduleType}, #{scheduleDate}, #{scheduleContent}, NOW(), #{createdBy})
